name: Sergei Ivanov
title: Frontend Developer
summary: JavaScript Developer with a passion for learning and applying new technologies, including React.

experience.name: Javascript Game Developer, MYTONA
resp: Developed 100+ playable ads for various ad platforms.
Implemented different game mechanics for advertisement, such as: Match3, Tiles, Merge, Hidden Object, Puzzles, Colouring etc.
Worked with spine and framed animations.
Managed and optimised assets, via Photoshop and asset packers.
Communicated with artists, producers and motion designers during all stages to maintain the quality of product.

experience.name: Frontend Developer, EPAM Systems
resp: Developed a variety of applications for famous American, Canadian and Europe publishers in e-learning sphere.
Built landing pages for Textbooks, Created interactive models and services for their students to work with topic in a more engaging way.
Created a services to allow teachers easily evaluate students results and share materials optimal way.
Made all these applications accessible for people with disabilities, so they could use them comfortably.

experience.name: Math algorithms analyst, Competentum Group
resp: Wrote scripts, built and structured math algorithms for content on interactive e-learning platforms, using algebra, geometry, combinatorics, mathematical analysis, statistics and probability and trigonometry.

education.name: Bachelor's degree, Mathematics and Computer Science, Udmurt State University
